subject: Plus X Pedals Shipping
description_text:
Order #SSN1889

Hi I ordered these pedals on June 29th and when I ordered them it said that
delivery time would be 2 to 6 business days but its been 3 business days
and I still havent even received any tracking information or updates.
Attached are proof of what I'm saying.

conversations.body_text: Hello Mr. Otto,Â   Any news? I haven't received any response, I'm a new customer to simsonn products and just want to know my order will be good.
